title: Book-Clone
para: A web application that mimics an online bookstore, allowing users to browse and search for books. It offers a smooth and responsive user experience, showcasing key frontend skills like routing, state management, and API integration.

title: Hotel-Booking
para: A hotel booking web application that allows users to search, view, and reserve rooms based on location, availability, and preferences. It offers a user-friendly interface highlighting features like dynamic and responsive design.

title: Nostra-Clone
para: A hotel booking web application that allows users to search, view, and reserve rooms based on location, availability, and preferences. It offers a user-friendly interface and simulates a real-world booking experience, highlighting.

title: Netflix-Clone
para: A Netflix clone that streams movies and shows using real-time API data. Features include a modern UI, user authentication, responsive design, and dynamic content built with React, Firebase, and styled with Tailwind CSS.

title: TripAdviosr-Clone
para: A Tripadvisor clone for exploring destinations, hotels, and restaurants. Features include search, filtering, maps, reviews, and responsive design. Built with React, Google Maps API, and styled using Tailwind CSS.

title: Weather-Clone
para: A responsive weather app üå§Ô∏è built with HTML, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript. It fetches real-time weather data using APIs and displays temperature, conditions, and location info with a clean UI üì±.

title: Actodo-Clone
para: Actodo ‚úÖ is a task management web app built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React ‚öõÔ∏è. It allows users to add, edit, complete, and delete tasks with a clean, responsive UI üì±. Tasks are stored in local storage for persistence.

title: Greenden
para: Greenden is a responsive landing page for a plant shop, built with HTML and styled using Tailwind CSS. It features a clean design, modern layout, and mobile-friendly interface to showcase products effectively.

title: BMI-Clone
para: A BMI (Body Mass Index) calculator web app built with HTML, Tailwind CSS, and React. It allows users to input height and weight to calculate BMI instantly, with responsive design and clear health category feedback.
